input.sentences: our tour of the city began at the city square .
pop culture references dotted the city .
but we also came across historically interesting buildings .
the main city church took our breath away | even my atheist cousin .
our final stop was | appropriately enough | the old cemetery .
output.sentences: First stop for the walking tour is the central square statue.
Second is the famous Elvis Presley muesum.
Next, we have the hotel that was opened back duruing World War 2.
Third, we will visit the cathedral with all the beautiful stained glass.
And lastly, we will visit the local cemetery.
